lexUnit.name: second.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of a state-of-affairs) lasting a sixtieth of a minute; SI time-length unit defined as the duration of 9,192,631,770 periods of the radiation corresponding to the transition between the two hyperfine levels of the ground state of the cesium 133 atom.

sentence.text: There were 12 seconds of overtime remaining as Alexander , the only starting Briton on the Monarchs roster , stepped up but his kick was about two feet wide .
